metadata.description: There are many benefits to holding our founders pass, your ticket to the Ghost Town ecosystem. Pass owners have lifetime whitelist privileges on all Ghost Town releases. This includes Showdown-related NFT packs, our upcoming PFP, and games that have yet to be announced. You will never have to worry about competing in a public sale. In addition, a large percentage of passes will provide generous discounts on future drops. Some of the more rare passes will provide as much as a 50% discount!
